title: what the hell is up with league's superiority complex?
body:
I mean, we can all be accused of this, but HOOOOOLY &(&^% do people have a superiority complex here. If you think a champ, like let's say master yi, is broken cause full tank>survive cc>cleanup way too strong DROVES of people come to say , "OH BUT HE'S BAD IN PLAT CAUSE THEY HAVE BRAINS" ,"LOL B5 SCRUBS ARE SO DUMB HE'S COUNTERED BY CC", "IN X ELO HE'S BAD YOU'RE JUST STUPID LEL". 
What the fuck? Does it make you feel THAT good to shit on people while you hide behind your computer? 
fucking &*(*&^@#iies man.

i just saw a QQ OP thread and so many people just make it their mission to try and start shit for no real reason, only to be dicks and look super fucking cringe while doing it. It just baffles me to no extent sometimes. Just chill the fuck out you edge lord???

especially the people on other boards that scream "TROLL" you sound the stupidest of them all holy fuck

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Prophet of Urgod,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AQaGR2cz,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-18T20:38:40.057+0000)
>
> Pretty sure this is to be posted in the Roleplay boards. New rules.

what?
It's also a way of putting things in perspective. But doing that is a nice thing. And some people don't find being nice rewarding, so they do it in a rotten way.

bronze 3s can kiss my bronze 2 ass

/s

A mixture of kids and manchildren, just like all PvP games.

Incidentally yi is not just bad in plat, he is bad in silver and high bronze.
yi is absolutely hilarious in top against darius, i dont remember who but a high elo streamer did a video on it
There's even at least one moderator here that has what you are referring to, but he/she takes that attitude to a different section of the boards, or at the least used to before becoming a moderator.
